verses.roman:
āmā haite ye nā haya, se tomā haite haya
āmāre karilā daṇḍa, āna kebā haya

synonyms: āmā haite—from Me; ye—whatever; nā haya—is not; se—that; tomā haite—from you; haya—becomes possible; āmāre—Me; karilā daṇḍa—punished; āna—others; kebā haya—what to speak of.
translation: "You can do whatever I cannot. Indeed, you can chastise even Me, not to speak of others.
